p: Three biological replicates were performed for each experiment. One-way analysis of variance (ANOVA) was performed by SPSS 23.0 (IBM Corporation, Armonk, NY, USA), and p < 0.01 was used as the cutoff for significant differences. Clustering analysis, PCA and OPLS-DA were carried out using R ( http://www.r-project.org/). MultiQuant software was used to integrate and correct chromatographic peaks. Software Analyst 1.6.3 was used to process mass spectrometry data and Microsoft Office Excel 2019 was used to process data and draw some of the charts.
